name: Shell-remplace-f-g
tagline: Remplacer les lettres f par g dans les noms de fichiers textes ayant plus de 10 lignes
body:
#!/bin/sh
for i in $( find . -name '*f*' )
	do 
		#echo $i
		count=$( cat $i | wc -l)
		#echo $count
		if [ $count -gt 10 ]
			then echo "$i;$count"
			r=$( echo $i | sed 's/f/g/g')
			mv $i $r
		fi
done
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
